kkr8WJhe6Ysn.title: Default Template
kkr8WJhe6Ysn.values:
blog-image-top=>Blog - Image Top
blog-image-left=>Blog - Image Left
grid-rows=>Grid - Rows
grid-rows-filtered=>Grid - Rows with Filtering
grid-staggered=>Grid - Staggered
grid-staggered-filtered=>Grid - Staggered with Filtering
kkr8WJhe6Ysn.fieldCaption: Select the default display template for the blog pages.

JDAfug6PwjTd.title: Default Grid Columns
JDAfug6PwjTd.fieldCaption: The default number of columns in grid layouts. Only applies when using a grid layout template.

cCpRU4LCV218.title: Use Post Excerpts
cCpRU4LCV218.fieldCaption: Use shortened content excerpts. If turned off the full post will display in post lists.

aultvykbU5ua.title: Excerpt Length
aultvykbU5ua.fieldCaption: The number of words in post excerpts, 250 max. Custom excerpts are not restricted by this setting.

oZ582SIm6g5k.title: Read More Link
oZ582SIm6g5k.fieldCaption: The link after post excerpts. Enter desired text. For no link leave blank or set to -1

FQ6IKTeJhrPV.title: Image Width
FQ6IKTeJhrPV.fieldCaption: Specify a width for images in the post list view.

llj4luJcp7na.title: Image Height
llj4luJcp7na.fieldCaption: Specify a height for images in the post list view.

WmrqPepx7Ceu.title: Show Post Format
WmrqPepx7Ceu.fieldCaption: Show the post format for each post.

0aZi7eggdWlu.title: Show Date
0aZi7eggdWlu.fieldCaption: Show the date associated with each post.

HhcswkmfhGqr.title: Show Categories
HhcswkmfhGqr.fieldCaption: Show the categories associated with each post.

hXtrZjazFtih.title: Show Comment Count
hXtrZjazFtih.fieldCaption: Show the comment count and link with each post.

CHjjtB6p2cgR.title: Show Tags
CHjjtB6p2cgR.fieldCaption: Show the tags associated with each post.

kKspineTvaur.title: Show Featured Image
kKspineTvaur.fieldCaption: Display the featured image on the single post. This may not apply to some post formats.

fQMsLqC7kIXo.title: Image Width
fQMsLqC7kIXo.fieldCaption: Specify a width for images on single posts.

jJv92l2y07BV.title: Image Height
jJv92l2y07BV.fieldCaption: Specify a height for images on single posts.

7BqhFcYIKIFt.title: Show Post Format
7BqhFcYIKIFt.fieldCaption: Show the post format for each single post page.

IxTvswQXdygO.title: Show Date
IxTvswQXdygO.fieldCaption: Show the date for each single post.

lzXubRX1yL3N.title: Show Categories
lzXubRX1yL3N.fieldCaption: Show the categories for each single post.

8dAcbEoJPW6G.title: Show Comment Link
8dAcbEoJPW6G.fieldCaption: Show the comments link for each single post.

rkhOPToW8B9V.title: Show Post Navigation
rkhOPToW8B9V.fieldCaption: Include links to the next and previous post in your blog.

Jq2qfmTnup6u.title: Audio Format
